title: Analyze influences on the development of democracy

content.question:
Analyze the extent to which TWO of the following influenced the development of democracy between 1820 and 1840.
Jacksonian economic policy
Changes in electoral politics 
Second Great Awakening
Westward movement

frqParts.text:
Analyze the extent to which TWO of the following influenced the development of democracy between 1820 and 1840.
Jacksonian economic policy
Changes in electoral politics 
Second Great Awakening
Westward movement

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
